title: Hana no Koe
sinopse:
1. The Enchanted Peony
   A valedictorian finds a beautiful peony.

2. The Butterfly Visits the Spring Garden
   A butterfly turns into a human and meets a human boy.

3. The Cry of the Tiger
   A man has to stay the night in the mountains where he meets a recluse family of three.

4. The Serpent Princess's Sanctuary
   A brother and sister meet after being separated at birth.
